title: Lowest Private Nonguaranteed External Debt
description: In 2022, Botswana had one of the lowest private nonguaranteed external debt stocks in the world, amounting to just $4.3 million.

title: Minimal Public and Publicly Guaranteed Debt from IDA
description: Botswana's public and publicly guaranteed debt from the International Development Association was only $45,000 in 2023, showcasing prudent fiscal management.

title: High Dependency on Coal for Electricity
description: In 2022, 96.19% of Botswana's electricity production was derived from coal, indicating a heavy reliance on non-renewable energy sources.
